description: User discusses exercise goals, creates tracker, edits it, then references past conversation

turns.user_says: I've been thinking about getting more exercise but I keep failing at it

expected_behavior.response: acknowledge struggle, ask clarifying questions, show empathy

turns.user_says: Yeah, I want to exercise 3 times a week but with the kids' schedules it's really hard to find time. Emma has soccer on Tuesdays and Thursdays and Jake has piano on Wednesdays.

expected_behavior.response: empathize with scheduling challenge, acknowledge specific constraints
expected_behavior.notes_should_capture: Emma - soccer Tue/Thu, Jake - piano Wed, exercise goal 3x/week

turns.user_says: Can you make a simple goal tracker for this exercise thing?

expected_behavior.response: confirm creating tracker, describe what it will contain

turns.user_says: Actually let's make it 2 times a week, that's more realistic given everything
What days did I say the kids have activities again?

expected_behavior.response: recall Emma soccer Tue/Thu, Jake piano Wed from earlier

turns.user_says: So maybe Monday and Friday mornings would work for exercise

expected_behavior.response: confirm good timing, offer to add to tracker
